    public class Text
extends AbstractPositioning<String>
    print text near a chunk with a generic tag
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        protected void draw(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas,
        float x,
        float y,
        float width,
        float height,
        String genericTag)
             throws com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        Specified by:
        draw in class AbstractPositioning<String>
        x - the calculated x position to draw, influenced by AdvancedImpl.getShiftx()
        y - the calculated y position to draw, influenced by AdvancedImpl.getShifty()
        width - width of the Chunk that was drawn or -1
        height - height of the Chunk that was drawn or -1
        genericTag - the generic tag that caused the call to this method
        Throws:
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        See Also:
        Advanced.getDelayed(java.lang.String)
